name: Chef Sanjeev Kapoor
bio: Sanjeev Kapooor  is a renowned chef with over 10 years of experience in the culinary arts. He has cooked up over 500 delicious recipes and has received over 10,000 likes for his creations.

name: Chef Kunal Kapoor
bio: Kunal Kapoor is a talented chef with 7 years of experience in the kitchen. He has cooked up over 300 mouth-watering recipes and has received over 8,000 likes for her culinary creations.

name: Chef Harpal Singh Sokhi
bio: Harpal Singh Sokhi is a promising chef with 5 years of experience. He has cooked up over 200 delectable recipes and has received over 5,000 likes for his cooking.

name: Chef Garima Arora
bio: Garima Arora is a seasoned chef with 12 years of experience in the culinary world. She has cooked up over 800 flavorful recipes and has received over 15,000 likes for her creations.

name: Chef Ranveer Brar
bio: Ranveer Brar is a rising star in the culinary world with 3 years of experience. He has cooked up over 150 delicious recipes and has received over 4,000 likes for his cooking.

name: Chef Ritu Dalmia
bio: Ritu Dalmia is a skilled chef with 8 years of experience in the kitchen. She has cooked up over 400 mouth-watering recipes and has received over 9,000 likes for her culinary creations.
